title: Mesa Verde National Park: Entrance Fee-Free Days
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes     Entrance Fee-Free Days                Entrance Fee-Free Days in 2016       Mesa Verde National Park, along with all National Park Service sites, will waive its entrance fee as part of a nationwide initiative to encourage everyone to visit their national park. This year, the entrance fee-free days are:     January 18   Martin Luther King, Jr. Day    April 16 to 24  National Park Week    August 25 to 28  National Park Service Birthday Weekend    September 24  National Public Lands Day    November 11  Veterans Day
